description: Among the Ittou-ryuu`s finest swordsmen. Of peasant origin, he became a swordsman to avenge his sister, who was killed as a child by a samurai. Taito is one of the few swordsmen who has fought Manji and survived. He has also fought by Manji`s side as well. He can be considered a kenshi, a swordsman who is not from the samurai class.
name: Magatsu Taito
